design.appearanceSpecification: The applet will have a clean, minimalist design with a light gray background. The primary color will be a vibrant blue for interactive elements. Text will be displayed in a clear, sans-serif font.
design.blueprint:
- App Title
  - Display of current clicked number
  - Increment button
design.functionalitySpecification:
The user will see a number displayed on the screen, initialized to 0. Below this number, there will be a button. Tapping the button will increase the displayed number by 1. The number displayed will update in real-time after each click. Workflow:
1. App opens: User sees 'Clicked: 0'.
2. User taps the button: The number updates to 'Clicked: 1'.
3. User taps the button again: The number updates to 'Clicked: 2'.
design.name: Clicker Demo
